Class AITests

  • java.lang.Object
    • AITests
  • public class AITests
extends java.lang.Object
    Unit tests used throughout development of the AI class, for testing of each strategy.

      • isMoveValid

        public boolean isMoveValid​(Move move,
                           boolean isWhite)
        Checking if a list of valid moves contains the specified move
        Parameters:
        move - move we are looking for
        Returns:
        true if list contains move, false otherwise

      • testMonteCarloMove

        public void testMonteCarloMove()
        Testing that the Heuristic AI returns one of the best moves.

      • testHeuristicMove

        public void testHeuristicMove()
        Testing that the Heuristic AI returns a move that limits the opponents moves.

      • testCGTMove

        public void testCGTMove()
        Testing that the CGT AI returns one of the best moves. This test shows the evaluate() method returning before the 5 seconds, and so the GameValue is then used to return a move.

      • testRandomMove

        public void testRandomMove()
        Testing that the random AI returns a valid move
